data.title: 9 TV Celebs Who Participated In Beauty Pageants Before Gaining Popularity
meta_keywords: tv celebs who participated in beauty pageants
tv celebs who participated in miss india
tv celebs who participated in beauty contests
data.meta_description: Here are all the TV actresses who took part in beauty pageants.
data.text:
Modelling and acting are but two faces of the same coin. Often, outsiders – as in those who were not born to famous parents – get into the world of modelling before they can become actors. It is a way to get one foot in in the entertainment industry and to gain visibility. Several of our TV celebrities, who often tend to be from non-acting backgrounds try their hand at modelling first. Many of them end up participating in beauty pageants to further their reach. Here are a few such TV celebs who participated in pageants early on in their careers.

Smriti Irani

Our current Information and Broadcasting and Textiles Minister Smriti Irani’s claim to fame was the uber popular K-serial Kyunki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi. But prior to her acting career, Smriti Irani dabbled in modelling. She was one of the finalists of Miss India in 1998.

Gauri Pradhan

Smriti Irani’s on-screen bahu, and former lead actor of another hit K-serial Kutumb, Gauri Pradhan also participated in Miss India in 1998. She was one of the top ten finalists that year.

Gauahar Khan

One of the most beloved small screen actors, Gauahar Khan, who even won the seventh season of Bigg Boss also participated in Femina Miss India. She was only 18 when she took part in the pageant in 2002. She came fourth.

Divyanka Tripathi Dahiya

One of the most successful TV actresses, Divyanka started her career as an anchor on Akashvani in Bhopal. She also went onto participate in the Pantene Zee Teen Queen pageant in 2003, where she won the title of Miss Beautiful Skin.

Aishwarya Sakhuja

Aishwarya was recently spotted in Sarabhai vs Sarabhai: Take 2 as Sonya, and has done several other TV shows. This model-turned-actress started her journey in the Miss India pageant. She was one of the finalists in 2006.

Mihika Verma

The Yeh Hai Mohabbatein actor made her acting debut in 2007 with Virrudh. But, before that she had won the Miss India International title in 2004. She represented India in the Miss International 2004 competition as well.

Erica Fernandes

The Kuch Rang Pyar Ke Aise Bhi actress, who has a successful YouTube channel, is also a former pageant contestant. She participated in Miss India in 2011, and finished in the top 10.

Reshmi Ghosh

Reshmi made her TV debut with Kyunki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi and went on to act in several other TV shows. In 2002, she was crowned Miss India Earth.

Asha Negi

Winner of Nach Baliye 6 and Rithvik Dhanjani’s beau, Asha also has a history of participating in pageants. In 2009, she even won the title of Miss Uttarakhand.

Read iDiva for the latest in Bollywood, fashion looks, beauty and lifestyle news.
